channel.title: Problems Logging Into server
channel.description: Every time I try logging into a server using moparscape it tells me that there was a problem connecting to the server and that it might be down. This happens for every server. I tried Shutting down anti-virus and adding the port as an exception in windows firewall. It still doesn't work. Do I have to open the port in my router? If so how do I do that? Can anybody help me out?

item.title: Problems Logging Into server
item.dc:creator: @big_donut708 big donut708
item.description:
@big_donut708 wrote:

But how can it be fixed?
